doc:
Olan Soule https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Olan_Soule 0 Olan Evart Soule (February 28, 1909 – February 1, 1994) was an American character actor and voice-over performer who had professional credits in nearly 7,000 radio shows and commercials, appearances in 200 television series and television films, and in over 60 films. Soule's voice work on television included his 15-year role (1968-1983) as Batman on several animated series that were either devoted to or involved the fictional "Dark Knight" superhero. Olan_Evart_Soule ( February_28_,_1909 – February_1_,_1994 ) was an_American_character_actor_and_voice-over_performer who had professional_credits in nearly_7,000_radio_shows_and_commercials , appearances in 200_television_series_and_television_films , and in over_60_films . Soule 's_voice_work on television included his_15-year_role ( 1968-1983_) as Batman on several_animated_series that were either devoted to_or_involved the_fictional_"_Dark_Knight_"_superhero .
